Understanding the ContextThis is a Results question, not a Problems question. Asking this question now will move the conversation backwards, and take you in a different direction.

The best question is, “Do you foresee any other barriers in achieving your goals for patient safety and patient experience?”

This Problems question helps probe deeper into issues faced by Dr. Chu without jumping prematurely to solutions.

It will help you to know the answer to this question to continue. Here is how Dr. Chu would have answered:

“Let’s face it, time is always a challenge. As much as I would like to collaborate more with Pharmacy, bring in specialist consults, and spend more time with patients, that won’t always be possible. I’m already stretched thin, and I know every hospitalist at Maycomb feels the same time pressures that I do. However, once I start implementing some of these ideas, I could very well see some improvement. For instance, if I can bring in a consult for my more difficult cases, that will free me up to spend more time with the other patients, which should increase their satisfaction.”
